title: Valid User Registration
steps: Send POST request to /api/v1/users/register with valid data | Check response status | Check response body for userId and authToken
expected: Response status is 201 Created and contains userId and authToken

title: Duplicate Email Registration
steps: Send POST request to /api/v1/users/register with an email that already exists | Check response status | Check response body for error message
expected: Response status is 409 Conflict and error message is 'Email already registered'

title: Invalid Password Registration
steps: Send POST request to /api/v1/users/register with a password that does not meet criteria | Check response status | Check response body for validation error details
expected: Response status is 400 Bad Request with specific error details

title: Invalid Mobile Number Registration
steps: Send POST request to /api/v1/users/register with an invalid mobile number format | Check response status | Check response body for validation error
expected: Response status is 400 Bad Request with 'Mobile number format is invalid'

title: Rate Limiting Exceeded
steps: Send 6 POST requests to /api/v1/users/register from the same IP within an hour | Check response status for the 6th request
expected: Response status is 429 Too Many Requests
